resources.string: I like to give oral pleasure.
Please indicate all the practices you are comfortable with. If you prefer, you can fill this page privately. But don\'t be selfish! You should both have fun!
I like to receive oral pleasure.
I like to play with my partner anally.
I like to be played with anally.
Select all items you have at hand and would like to include in the game!
Select all card sets to include in the game. A basic card set is always included.
Select all levels of play to include in the game!
Tap the card to reveal the next sexy task or dare. Some cards have a time limit. In this case a timer will appear, tap it to start the card\'s time!
Some cards also include a random number represented by a üé≤. In this case tap the die that appears on the screen!

Both players play at the same time, so a card will specify who does what. Both players start with a JOKER to skip a card and a TIME WARP to double or half the time. Tap their respective logos to use! You may uncover further items during play!
Finish the round by pressing the play button at the bottom of the screen.
Are you sure you want to leave the current game? All progress will be lost!
Are you sure you want to skip the remaining time and proceed to next round?
Are you sure you want to use this joker?
Are you sure you want to proceed to next round? Timer has not been started or time is still running!
Please select which player receives the joker from the challenge.
Please select whether you completed the challenge and should receive your joker.
You have to select at least one level!
However, you can keep playing until there are available cards, if you want!
Level 0 - Includes some kissing and touching, but clothes stay on!
Level 1 - Includes more intense kissing, touching and undressing!
Level 2 - Includes all kinds of foreplay, petting and crazy games!
Level 3 - Includes sex, orgasms and more wild stuff!
